segments.text: My attention is drawn to that unstable stool where the boy is standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly precarious, with its legs splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, reaching into that cookie jar, completely unconcerned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep thinking about the moment it might finally give way beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could really hurt him, especially onto a hard kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him tumbling backward makes me wince a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing so close, she might get caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a dangerous situation, yet everyone else seems entirely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still busy drying dishes, oblivious to this impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning to them, to stabilize that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Accidents can happen so quickly, and this one feels almost inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is filled with subtle tensions that are hard to ignore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets his cookie before anything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
